name: iHeartDownload
0:
”Alexa, Open iHeart Download”
”Alexa, Start iHeart Download”
”Alexa, Launch iHeart Download”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: iheart download
des: This Alexa skill can send you a link to your phone so you can download the iHeart app. All you have to do is say 'download app' after activating the Skill.
